summary: VEHICLE STALLED IN HEAVY TRAFFIC AND WOULD NOT RE-START.  UPON TROUBLESHOOTING REASON FOR NO FUEL SUPPLY, FOUND BURNT CONNECTOR PIN ON FUEL PUMP HOUSING.  FUEL PUMP TESTED GOOD.  HEAT FROM POOR CONNECTION HAS MELTED THE TOP OF THE FUEL PUMP HOUSING.  I CAN SMELL GASOLINE VAPORS.  SPARKING CONNECTIONS OR HOT, MELTED PARTS IN THIS AREA IS A PROBLEM.  I HAVE PHOTOS TO DOCUMENT DAMAGE.  THIS IS A FIRE HAZARD!  *TR
